alert.note: Alert for Christian; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 12:55PM EDT until April 12 at 9:18PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... South Fork Little River at Hopkinsville - Bypass .Runoff from heavy rain over the last 12 to 24 hours has caused the South Fork Little River at Hopkinsville - Bypass to rise into minor flood stage. The river will crest near 18.3 feet this afternoon and fall below flood stage this evening. For the Little River...including Hopkinsville - Bypass...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Little River at Hopkinsville - Bypass. * WHEN...From this morning to this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 18.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 18.3 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon to 16.2 feet and begin rising again late tomorrow evening. It will rise to 17.7 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
